items.title: Baseview-bundle for the editor
items.description: Baseview now contain a Webpack-configuration for creating a bundle. Apps are exported as standard modules.

items.title: Possible to individually build Baseview modules' SCSS.
items.description: Baseview modules's SCSS individually with all mixins and dependecies imported to each module.

items.title: Possible to use dynamic values as value on custom meta tag
items.description: Possible to use dynamic values e.g {{ get.current.id }} as the value on custom meta tags. Use the same variables as the view.
